snippet: Sherjill MacDonald scored two second-half goals, lifting the Chicago Fire to a crucial 2-0 win over the Red Bulls.
abstract: Chicago Fire wins crucial game against New York red Bulls, 2-0, in MLS soccer action.
lead_paragraph: Sherjill MacDonald scored two second-half goals, lifting the Chicago Fire to a crucial 2-0 win over the Red Bulls.

headline.seo: Chicago Fire Too Much for Red Bulls
